content:
Damiano Testa said:

I did

  • rename topics that I created --> move to --> rename/move topics that I created and got the notification
  • rename/move topics that I created --> use the edit button on top --> rename/move/rename topics that I created and no notification, but topic name changed.

When you move topics or messages, you can toggle checkboxes to set whether a notification is sent to the new/old topic. The edit button does not send a notification, as it's often used to fix a typo or make some other minor edit.
Alya, thank you for the clarification! I had not paid attention to the checkbox, but now I understand, thank you very much!
